scripts.clean: cd ./core && npm run clean && cd ../respondent && npm run clean && cd ../server && npm run clean && cd .. && npm-workspace clean
scripts.build: npm install && npm-workspace install && cd ./core && npm run prepare && cd ../respondent && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run prepare
scripts.start: npm install && npm-workspace install && cd ./core && npm run prepare && cd ../respondent && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run prepare &&  npm run start
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run build:core-watch" "npm run test:core-watch" "npm run build:server-watch" "npm run start:server-watch" "npm run test:server-watch"
scripts.test: npm run test:core && npm run test:server
